abstract: You might be tempted to agree with Dow Chemical chief executive Andrew Liveris that the story of two fired executives at his company becoming a “soap opera” — except even soap operas aren’t this confusing.
lead_paragraph: You might be tempted to agree with Dow Chemical chief executive Andrew Liveris that the story of two fired executives at his company becoming a “soap opera” — except even soap operas aren’t this confusing.

headline.main: More Weekend Video: Dows of Our Lives
